T02D3139:320a-3: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga / thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3139:320a-4: de la re zhig pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg
T02D3139:320a-5: pa'i sgor byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed thob pa'i
T02D3139:320a-6: dge bsnyen nam / dge tshul lam /
T02D3139:320a-8: gang zag gi mchod rten nam /
T02D3139:320a-9: bris sku la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa byed
T02D3139:320a-10: pas gang rab tu gnas par bya ba mtshan nyid
T02D3139:320a-11: dang ldan pa de'i nya 'khor cig skyang nul byas
T02D3139:320a-12: te / mthar tsandan la sogs pa'i dri zhim po'i chus byugs nas /
T02D3139:320a-13: mdun du mandal gru bzhi pa khru gang yan chod nas ji tsam nus par byugs nas /
T02D3139:320b-0: @320b der padma 'dab ma brgyad pa tshon gyis bri bar bya'o //
T02D3139:320b-1: de'i steng du mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa
T02D3139:320b-2: gser la sogs pa'i rgyu las byas pa kha rgyan
T02D3139:320b-3: dang / mgul dkris dang bcas par rin po che dang /
T02D3139:320b-6: ga bur la sogs pa dri zhim po dang sbyor ba'i chu klung gi chu gtsang mas dgang zhing /
T02D3139:320b-7: grangs kyang gcig nas brtsams te ji snyed 'byor pa gzhag par bya'o //
T02D3139:320b-8: me tog la sogs pa'i yo byad ci 'byor pa rnams kyang mdun du sta gon du byas la /
T02D3139:320b-9: nang par snga dro'i dus su yid du 'ong ba'i
T02D3139:320b-10: bla re bres pas mdzes pa'i gnas su sgrub pa
T02D3139:320b-11: pos stan bde ba la skyil mo krung la sogs
T02D3139:320b-12: pa mnyam par gzhag pa'i spyod lam gyis gnas te
T02D3139:320b-13: / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la gtor ma byin la /
T02D3139:320b-14: gser ram dngul gyi gzhi'am grog la 'ang rung /
T02D3139:320b-16: ye dharm'a he tu pra bh'a b'a he tunte sh'anta th'a ga to hya ba da ta /
T02D3139:320b-17: te sh'a nytsa yo ni ro dha ae wam b'a
T02D3139:320b-18: d'i ma h'a shra ma na: zhes pa tshar bdun
T02D3139:320b-19: du bris la / tshar re re zhing lan bdun bdun bklags te /
T02D3139:320b-20: bum pa'i chus bkrus la bum pa de nyid du bzhugs par bya'o //
T02D3139:320b-21: de nas bum pa'i steng du zla ba la sngags
T02D3139:320b-22: kyi phreng ba dkar po 'od dang bcas pa skad
T02D3139:320b-24: de'i 'od zer gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
T02D3139:320b-25: nas lha'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun rnams bkug la bum pa'i
T02D3139:320b-26: chu de sngags kyi phreng bzhu ba dang lhan cig
T02D3139:320b-27: ro gcig tu gyur pas bum pa gang bar dmigs
T02D3139:320b-28: nas / de lag pas reg nas brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3139:320b-29: de'i rjes la mchod rten la sogs pa'i nang ngam
T02D3139:320b-30: snying gar zla ba la snga ma ltar sngags kyi
T02D3139:320b-32: de'i 'od kyis 'jig rten khyab par bltas te /
T02D3139:320b-33: des sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bskul nas /
T02D3139:320b-34: gang zhig rab tu gnas par bya ba mchod rten
T02D3139:320b-35: la sogs pa de'i gzugs kyis byon nas de dang
T02D3139:320b-37: sngags la sogs pa thams cad ro gcig tu gyur bar bsams nas /
T02D3139:320b-38: lugs su blugs pa rnams la ni dngos su khrus bya'o //
T02D3139:321a-0: glegs bam la sogs pa rnams la ni ma @321a * //
T02D3139:321a-1: long la bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa dang /
T02D3139:321a-3: sgra dang bcas pas sngags bzlas bzhin du sngar gyi bum pa'i chus khrus gsol bar bya'o //
T02D3139:321a-4: de nas dri zhim pos bsgos pa'i gos kyi sku
T02D3139:321a-5: phyi ba byas pa'i rjes la ci 'byor pa'i na
T02D3139:321a-6: bza' dang rgyan rnams dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3139:321a-7: de nas me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa ci 'byor pa rnams dbul lo //
T02D3139:321a-8: de'i rjes la lag pas reg nas snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3139:321a-9: de nas mchod rten nam lugs sku'i nang du gro ga la snying po bris te gzhug go //
T02D3139:321a-10: glegs bam bris sku'i ni mtha' mar bri'o //
T02D3139:321a-11: de ltar byas nas slar yang me tog la sogs
T02D3139:321a-12: pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod cing rol mo'i sgra
T02D3139:321a-13: yang bsgrags te / 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing //
T02D3139:321a-14: sa'am 'on te bar snang 'khod pa dag / skye dgu kun la rtag tu byams byed cing //
T02D3139:321a-15: nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig / rgyal ba dgra rgyal bden pa'i byin gang gis //
T02D3139:321a-16: bden 'di gsungs pa 'di la sdig med cing //
T02D3139:321a-17: lhar bcas lha min gyis rtag mchod 'os pa'i //
T02D3139:321a-18: bden pa des ni deng 'dir bde legs shog / dam chos bdud rtsi thams cad mkhyen pa yis //
T02D3139:321a-19: zhal nas gsungs pa bsil ba'i ro 'di yi //
T02D3139:321a-20: nyon mongs 'bar ba'i me yis gdungs pa yi //
T02D3139:321a-21: 'gro kun sdug bsngal rtag tu zhi byed shog /
T02D3139:321a-22: ces brjod cing sngar gyi bum pa'i chu'i lhag mas
T02D3139:321a-23: rab tu gnas pa'i sa gzhi dang /
T02D3139:321a-24: gnas khang dag tu nyung zad gtor bar bya'o //
T02D3139:321a-25: bya ba rnams rdzogs pa na rdul tshon la sogs pa rnams chu bo chen po'am /
T02D3139:321a-26: khron pa rnying par dor nas sa gzhi lci ba sar par byugs te /
T02D3139:321a-27: rab gnas byed pa'i slob dpon dang /
T02D3139:321a-28: dge slong la mchod ston dang /
T02D3139:321a-29: yon dbul ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D3139:321a-30: de nas rten de la mchod pa phul te /
T02D3139:321a-31: yon bdag 'di'i ched du bzhugs la sems can gyi don mdzad par gsol ba gdab bo //
T02D3139:321a-32: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga thun mong pa pandi
T02D3139:321a-33: ta dpal su ma ti k'irtis mdzad pa rdzogs so
